title: Newt Gingrich Tweeted About San Bernardino Attack in November
subtitle: Newt Gingrich almost certainly wasn't referencing the San Bernardino shooting in a 13 November 2015 tweet.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Newt Gingrich tweeted about the 2 December 2015 San Bernardino shooting on 13 November 2015.
